algorithm_technique: Multi-source Breadth-First Search (BFS) starting from all gates
problem_summary_simple: Fill empty rooms with the shortest distance to a gate, or INF if unreachable.
problem_summary_technical: Perform BFS from all gates simultaneously to find shortest distances to empty rooms, updating in-place.
key_insights: Treat gates as sources for a multi-source BFS.
The BFS naturally finds the shortest path in an unweighted grid.
Initialize the queue with all gate positions.
